forum.content:
Hey guys, i gonna establish a group for studying and preparing language examinations(include LRSW). Are there any people so far getting interested in working hard with me?

Here, we can have opening discussions, prepare for what subjects we're handling in, and increase the capability of persona language level.

Hence, what you guys can talk about are either language oriented or anything that are worth spreading to people.

Feel free to speak out! I'm supposed to make some people who are brilliant on being themselves, and get guts to practice.

If there is anyone getting interested in, let me know that asap.

Looking forward your response!

Yours' Sincerely
forum.title: Learning Group Recruitment
